languages.text: Не доверяя полумерам, Лорд-капитан приказал взорвать отсек. Взрыв вызвал обвал износившихся перекрытий палубой ниже. Что еще тревожнее — пикт-рекордер отправленного на разведку сервочерепа показала, что зеркало не повреждено и находится в полости на месте взорванного помещения.

traits.locale_text: Не доверяя полумерам, Лорд-капитан приказал взорвать отсек. Взрыв вызвал обвал износившихся перекрытий палубой ниже. Что еще тревожнее — пикт-камера отправленного на разведку сервочерепа показала, что зеркало не повреждено и находится в полости на месте взорванного помещения.

languages.text: Deciding that half-measures were not enough, the Lord Captain gave the order to blow up the compartment. The explosion caused some worn-out beams on the lower levels to collapse. What was even more alarming, the pict-recorder in the servo-skull sent to survey the situation showed that the mirror was not damaged in the slightest and was now lying in the cavity left by the explosion.
languages.original_text: Не доверяя полумерам, Лорд-капитан приказал взорвать отсек. Взрыв вызвал обвал износившихся перекрытий палубой ниже. Что еще тревожнее — пикт-рекордер отправленного на разведку сервочерепа показала, что зеркало не повреждено и находится в полости на месте взорванного помещения.

traits.locale_text: Deciding that half-measures were not enough, the Lord Captain ordered to blow up the compartment. The explosion caused the beams on the lower levels to collapse. What's worse, the pict camera in the servoskull sent to survey the situation shows that the mirror was not damaged and can still be found in a cavity left by the explosion.

Deciding that half-measures were not enough, the Lord Captain ordered to blow up the compartment. The explosion caused the beams on the lower levels to collapse. What's worse, the pict camera in the servoskull sent to survey the situation shows that the mirror was not damaged and can still be found in a cavity left by the explosion.

Deciding that half-measures were not enough, the Lord Captain ordered to blow up the compartment. The explosion caused some worn out beams on the lower levels to collapse. What's worse, the pict-recorder in the servo-skull sent to survey the situation shows that the mirror was not damaged in the slightest and lies in the cavity left by the explosion.

Deciding that half-measures were not enough, the Lord Captain gave the order to blow up the compartment. The explosion caused some worn-out beams on the lower levels to collapse. What was even more alarming, the pict-recorder in the servo-skull sent to survey the situation showed that the mirror was not damaged in the slightest and was now lying in the cavity left by the explosion.

Deciding that half-measures were not enough, the Lord Captain gave the order to blow up the compartment. The explosion caused some worn-out beams on the lower levels to collapse. What was even more alarming, the pict-recorder in the servo-skull sent to survey the situation showed that the mirror was not damaged in the slightest and was now lying in the cavity left by the explosion.

Deciding that half-measures were not enough, the Lord Captain gave the order to blow up the compartment. The explosion caused some worn-out beams on the lower levels to collapse. What was even more alarming, the pict-recorder in the servo-skull sent to survey the situation showed that the mirror was not damaged in the slightest and was now lying in the cavity left by the explosion.

languages.text: 舰长大人意识到，折衷的手段是不会起作用的，于是决定炸毁船舱。剧烈的爆炸炸毁了飞船下层部分破旧的横梁。更加令人震惊的是，当伺服头骨被派去调查情况时，它的视讯记录仪显示镜子并没有受到丝毫损坏，此刻正平放在爆炸遗留下来的空洞之中。
languages.original_text: Deciding that half-measures were not enough, the Lord Captain gave the order to blow up the compartment. The explosion caused some worn-out beams on the lower levels to collapse. What was even more alarming, the pict-recorder in the servo-skull sent to survey the situation showed that the mirror was not damaged in the slightest and was now lying in the cavity left by the explosion.

traits.locale_text: 舰长大人意识到，折衷的手段是不会起作用的，于是决定炸毁船舱。剧烈的爆炸炸毁了飞船下层部分破旧的横梁。更加令人震惊的是，当伺服头骨被派去调查情况时，它的视讯记录仪显示镜子并没有受到丝毫损坏，此刻正平放在爆炸遗留下来的空洞之中。

languages.text: Convencid{mf|o|a} de que las soluciones más sencillas no van a dar resultado, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán ordenó detonar el compartimento entero. La explosión hace que algunas vigas desgastadas de los niveles inferiores colapsen, y lo que es más preocupante: el grabaimágenes del servocráneo enviado a examinar la situación revela que el espejo está intacto y ahora yace en el hueco que ha dejado la explosión.
languages.original_text: Deciding that half-measures were not enough, the Lord Captain gave the order to blow up the compartment. The explosion caused some worn-out beams on the lower levels to collapse. What was even more alarming, the pict-recorder in the servo-skull sent to survey the situation showed that the mirror was not damaged in the slightest and was now lying in the cavity left by the explosion.

traits.locale_text: Convencid{mf|o|a} de que las soluciones más sencillas no van a dar resultado, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán ordenó detonar el compartimento entero. La explosión hace que algunas vigas desgastadas de los niveles inferiores colapsen, y lo que es más preocupante: el grabaimágenes del servocráneo enviado a examinar la situación revela que el espejo está intacto y ahora yace en el hueco que ha dejado la explosión.

languages.text: 中途半端な対策ではダメだと判断したロード・キャプテンは、区画室の爆破を命じた。この爆発で、下層階の使い古された梁の一部が崩れ落ちた。さらに憂慮すべき事態がある。この状況を調査するため派遣されたサーヴォスカルのピクト・レコーダーによると、鏡はまったく損傷しておらず、爆発によってできた穴に倒れているだけということがわかった。
languages.original_text: Deciding that half-measures were not enough, the Lord Captain gave the order to blow up the compartment. The explosion caused some worn-out beams on the lower levels to collapse. What was even more alarming, the pict-recorder in the servo-skull sent to survey the situation showed that the mirror was not damaged in the slightest and was now lying in the cavity left by the explosion.

traits.locale_text: 中途半端な対策ではダメだと判断したロード・キャプテンは、区画室の爆破を命じた。この爆発で、下層階の使い古された梁の一部が崩れ落ちた。さらに憂慮すべき事態がある。この状況を調査するため派遣されたサーヴォスカルのピクト・レコーダーによると、鏡はまったく損傷しておらず、爆発によってできた穴に倒れているだけということがわかった。

languages.text: Der Lord Captain beschließt, keine halben Sachen mehr zu machen, und erteilt den Befehl, das Modul zu sprengen. Die Explosion hat einige ältere Träger auf den Unterdecks einstürzen lassen. Schlimmer noch: Der Vid-Rekorder in dem Servoschädel, der zur Beurteilung der Lage losgeschickt wird, zeigt etwas Erstaunliches: Der Spiegel hat keinerlei Schaden davongetragen, er liegt einfach unversehrt in dem Krater der Explosion.
languages.original_text: Deciding that half-measures were not enough, the Lord Captain gave the order to blow up the compartment. The explosion caused some worn-out beams on the lower levels to collapse. What was even more alarming, the pict-recorder in the servo-skull sent to survey the situation showed that the mirror was not damaged in the slightest and was now lying in the cavity left by the explosion.

traits.locale_text: Der Lord Captain beschließt, keine halben Sachen mehr zu machen, und erteilt den Befehl, das Modul zu sprengen. Die Explosion hat einige ältere Träger auf den Unterdecks einstürzen lassen. Schlimmer noch: Der Vid-Rekorder in dem Servoschädel, der zur Beurteilung der Lage losgeschickt wird, zeigt etwas Erstaunliches: Der Spiegel hat keinerlei Schaden davongetragen, er liegt einfach unversehrt in dem Krater der Explosion.

languages.text: Estimant que ces demi-mesures sont insuffisantes, {mf|le|la} seigneur-capitaine donne l'ordre de faire exploser le compartiment. L'explosion a provoqué l'effondrement de rayons usés dans les niveaux inférieurs. Plus alarmant encore, l'enregistreur vidéo du servocrâne envoyé pour évaluer la situation montre que le miroir n'a pas été endommagé le moins du monde et repose désormais dans la cavité créée par l'explosion.
languages.original_text: Deciding that half-measures were not enough, the Lord Captain gave the order to blow up the compartment. The explosion caused some worn-out beams on the lower levels to collapse. What was even more alarming, the pict-recorder in the servo-skull sent to survey the situation showed that the mirror was not damaged in the slightest and was now lying in the cavity left by the explosion.

traits.locale_text: Estimant que ces demi-mesures sont insuffisantes, {mf|le|la} seigneur-capitaine donne l'ordre de faire exploser le compartiment. L'explosion a provoqué l'effondrement de rayons usés dans les niveaux inférieurs. Plus alarmant encore, l'enregistreur vidéo du servocrâne envoyé pour évaluer la situation montre que le miroir n'a pas été endommagé le moins du monde et repose désormais dans la cavité créée par l'explosion.

languages.text: Alınan önlemlerin yeterli olmadığına karar veren Lord Kaptan, kompartımanın havaya uçurulmasını emrediyor. Patlama, alt seviyelerdeki bazı bakımsız kirişlerin çökmesine neden oluyor. Daha kötüsü ise durumu incelemek üzere gönderilen hizmeletin foto kaydedicisi, aynanın en ufak bir hasar görmediğini ve şu anda patlamayla oluşan çukurda bulunduğunu gösteriyor.
languages.original_text: Deciding that half-measures were not enough, the Lord Captain gave the order to blow up the compartment. The explosion caused some worn-out beams on the lower levels to collapse. What was even more alarming, the pict-recorder in the servo-skull sent to survey the situation showed that the mirror was not damaged in the slightest and was now lying in the cavity left by the explosion.
